section.name: Start Eclipse
section.span: Start Eclipse to work on Hippo projects.
section.p: You need to have installed Eclipse version >= 3.3.2
Start eclipse. E.g. on the commandline:
On the commandline you may add some flags to configure eclipse, such as using extra large memory. This is for example necessary for the Hippo CMS itself. How this is done, you can find here.
Eclipse askes for a workspace. This is a foldertree that contains information eclipse keeps of some of your projects. You may need to configure the workspace.
